description: Finalize requirements, user stories, and technical specifications. This is the first critical step.
Create Git repository, establish branching strategy, and add initial scaffolding (README, .gitignore).
Design and implement the initial database schema and migration files based on project specifications.
Create API endpoints for user registration, login, and session management. This is a critical bottleneck for the frontend.
Initialize the React project, configure build tools, and set up the component library. Can run in parallel with backend tasks.
Build the UI components for login and registration forms. This task cannot be completed until the auth API is ready.
Configure the staging server environment and create a basic continuous integration pipeline.
